overview: Man Hunter is a window into the world of gay hardcore cruise joints where men hunt men for sex. Animal instinct leads you there but watch out, cause some men are twisted, perverted, and want more from you than you can handle. This movie tells the story of cops on the hunt for a mysterious stranger who is collecting unsuspecting horny studs looking for mansex in a local cruise bar...the Ramrod. Time is running out, and our men in blue must don black leather, walk the walk, and stalk a stalker. Come explore the seedy, sweaty depths of sexuality between 13 of the hunkiest, wildest men in or out of a uniform!
title: Man Hunter
